User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the MarketConnect application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the User entity, matching Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The user's role within the application (customer, provider). This is for UI purposes and not for authorization.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

AdminRole.title: Admin Role
AdminRole.description: The existence of a document with a user's UID in the roles_admin collection designates them as an administrator. The document itself can be empty.

isAdmin.description: Confirms admin status. The existence of the document is the primary check.

Provider.title: Provider
Provider.description: Represents a service provider in the MarketConnect application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Provider entity.

description.description: A multi-line description of the provider.

categories.description: An array of service categories the provider belongs to.

location.description: The provider's physical location or service area.

status.description: The current status of the provider.

userId.description: A reference to the corresponding user document in the users collection.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the provider profile was created.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Private collection to designate admin users. The existence of a doc means the user is an admin.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

params.name: providerId
params.description: The unique identifier for the provider.
